+#![deny(unused_doc_comments)]
+#![feature(rustc_attrs)]
+
+macro_rules! foo { () => {}; }
+
+fn main() {
+    /// line1 //~ ERROR: unused doc comment
+    /// line2
+    /// line3
+    foo!();
+
+    // Ensure we still detect another doc-comment block.
+    /// line1 //~ ERROR: unused doc comment
+    /// line2
+    /// line3
+    foo!();
+}
